full_summary:
### Title

## Installation of a Telecommunication Shelter, Radio Frequency Antennas, and Electrical Work

### Solicitation Number

2023173296/A

### Tender Closing Date

2023-06-19T14:00:00

### Procurement Category

CNST

### Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking construction services for the installation of a Telecommunication Shelter, Radio Frequency antennas, and electrical work at a site located in Frelighsburg, Quebec. This is a two-phase competition, with the first phase consisting of pre-qualification based on mandatory requirements outlined in the attached Invitation to Tender (ITT). Shortlisted bidders will then be invited to provide a financial bid on the project.

### Mandatory Requirements

* Bid submissions must comply with mandatory requirements.
* Failure to meet mandatory requirements may result in bid rejection.
* Bidders must perform and complete the work by September 15th, 2023.
* A security requirement is associated with this ITT.
* A mandatory site visit is included in Phase Two.

### Bid Submission

* Tenders must be submitted electronically via email to: Charles.Langlois@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.
* Bid documents can be downloaded from the Canada Buys electronic tendering system.
* Bidders are responsible for regularly checking the online tendering system for updates on the tender.

### Note on Trade Agreements

The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. As a result, the integrity provisions are being applied in RCMP contracting activities.

### Contact Information

* Charles Langlois, Procurement Branch, RCMP - 73 Leikin Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R2.
* Email: Charles.Langlois@rcmp-grc.gc.ca, Phone: 514.348.7156.

### Attachment

The Invitation to Tender (ITT) document, including specifications and contract requirements, can be downloaded from the Canada Buys electronic tendering system.

The request for proposal allows for the installation of a telecommunication shelter on a site currently using an existing telecommunication facility.  There are mandatory security requirements associated with this installation. This might raise concerns.

''Once your team reviews these contracts, I need you to augment the documentation to incorporate the guidelines of official languages for Canada's tender bid process - throughout the submissions application.
